skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Focus on writing code that works consistently across different web browsers such as Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. Ensuring cross-browser compatibility is essential for reaching a wide audience .

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Focus on implementing server-side logic and business logic, which are the processes and rules that govern the functionality of an application. This includes handling user authentication, processing requests

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: Prioritizing user-centered design, placing the needs and preferences of the end users at the forefront of the design process. This involves conducting user research, creating user personas and empathizing with  target audience

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: Interacting without the need for external libraries or complex coding makes Webflow an ideal choice for those seeking to create visually engaging and dynamic websites.

portfolio.title: Food Delivery App
portfolio.description: Discover a world of culinary delights with our food delivery website. From diverse cuisines to swift doorstep delivery .
